thread.section_title: Sports Jobs and Sports Internships - WorkInSports.com
thread.title: CEO - Uniontown - Sports and Fitness

title: CEO - Uniontown - Sports and Fitness
text: Posted/Updated: 10-15-2015 Brief Job Description: An experienced leader with proven skills in fiscal management and accountability, growing membership and developing family oriented programs that leads to improved operating performance and impact in the community, and who will advocate the unique mission and vision in the community,   Since your site launched in 2000, WorkInSports.com has been the go to place for USA Baseball when we are looking to fill full-time openings and internships. Your reputation throughout the sports industry as a vital tool for job seekers and employers is well deserved. Thanks again! David Perkins
